title: From Beijing to Wuhan, China orders mass testing and restrictions as Covid cases rise
content:
1. From Beijing to Wuhan, China orders mass testing and restrictions as Covid cases rise  CNBC
  2. China's spiraling Delta variant outbreak hits Wuhan, as country introduces mass travel restrictions  CNN
  3. Panic-Buying And Transport Lockdowns. In Wuhan, It Feels Like Early Pandemic Again  NPR
  4. China seals city as its worst virus outbreak in a year grows  Associated Press
  5. GOP report says October 2019 Wuhan military games were ‘one of the earliest super spreader events’  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 北京から武漢まで、中国ではCovid感染者の増加に伴い、大量の検査と制限を指示
从北京到武汉，随着科威德病例的增加，中国下令进行大规模检测和限制。
從北京到武漢，隨着科威德病例的增加，中國下令進行大規模檢測和限制。
